text: Belgium competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Open water swimming== Belgium qualified one male open water swimmer. {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%;" |- !Athlete !Event !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Logan Vanhuys |align=left|Men's 10 km |1:48:17.5 |15 |} ==Swimming== Belgium entered 10 swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;
